channel.title: Ip problem
channel.description:
Hello All...
now ppl can play my server but they only can play when they have hamachi
i made a no-ip adress and the ppl still can't join my server even if its online...
how do i fix it

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Stijn_Scape Owner Stijn Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Stijn_Scape wrote:

[quote=“umair, post:9, topic:243722”]ok it’s very easy to fix this issue.

I myself had this same problem make sure you have your firewall off, do the expectation thingy, like adding a port. make sure you tick the small box, run ur no-ip make sure next to ur IP of server there is a Smiley face, make sure the simley face has red cheeks, therefore he is blushing…

then compile your server, and run.

Enjoy and i hope this helps you.[/quote]

nothing works :s

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @umair umair
item.description:
@umair wrote:

ok it’s very easy to fix this issue.

I myself had this same problem make sure you have your firewall off, do the expectation thingy, like adding a port. make sure you tick the small box, run ur no-ip make sure next to ur IP of server there is a Smiley face, make sure the simley face has red cheeks, therefore he is blushing…

then compile your server, and run.

Enjoy and i hope this helps you.

Read full topic

is your server hamachi , if it is tell me if now u ned to port foward
[/quote]

i have portforwarded =)

but still nothing works[/quote]

Allowed exceptions in firewall?

how do i fix it ?
